name: WP Issue Logger
author: Travis Lima, Johannes Floor

sections.description: A WordPress Issue logging plugin, built off of a WordPress CPT. This Plugin allows you to log an issue, give it a status and categorize the issue.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the \’/wp-content/plugins\’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to the \”WP Issue Logger\” tab in the Admin Menu to start logging issues.
sections.faq:
To be updated.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the \’/wp-content/plugins\’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to the \”WP Issue Logger\” tab in the Admin Menu to start logging issues.
